DocAttribute.Name: Degree
DocAttribute.Documentation: The algebraic degree of the basis functions.

DocAttribute.Name: ControlPointsList
DocAttribute.Documentation: The list of control points for the curve.

DocAttribute.Name: CurveForm
DocAttribute.Documentation: Used to identify particular types of curve; it is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: ClosedCurve
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication of whether the curve is closed; it is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: SelfIntersect
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication whether the curve self-intersects or not; it is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: UpperIndexOnControlPoints
DocAttribute.Documentation: The upper index on the array of control points; the lower index is 0. This value is derived from the control points list.

DocAttribute.Name: ControlPoints
DocAttribute.Documentation: The array of control points used to define the geometry of the curve. This is derived from the list of control points.

DocWhereRule.Name: SameDim
DocWhereRule.Documentation: All control points shall have the same dimensionality.
